issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

xcode 3.5.4 + iOS4.2 + itunes 10.1+ running mobile sdk version 1.5.0.1f46b05 + the nonJIT version of TiJsCore on an ipod

1.Ks > Mashups > Foursquare
2.enter valid log in credentials
3.tap log in

results: on button press, crash. Occurs in 4.1. and 4.2, regression

Mon Nov 8 16:29:39 unknown UIKitApplication:com.appcelerator.KitchenSink[0x4874][1471] : [INFO] starting geo
Mon Nov 8 16:29:39 unknown UIKitApplication:com.appcelerator.KitchenSink[0x4874][1471] : [INFO] received geo response
Mon Nov 8 16:29:39 unknown UIKitApplication:com.appcelerator.KitchenSink[0x4874][1471] : [INFO] sending foursquare API request for 37.390380859375,-122.0811767578125
Mon Nov 8 16:29:40 unknown ReportCrash[1482] : Formulating crash report for process KitchenSink[1471]
Mon Nov 8 16:29:40 unknown com.apple.launchd[1] : (UIKitApplication:com.appcelerator.KitchenSink[0x4874]) Job appears to have crashed: Segmentation fault
Mon Nov 8 16:29:40 unknown SpringBoard[44] : Application 'KitchenSink' exited abnormally with signal 11: Segmentation fault
Mon Nov 8 16:29:40 unknown ReportCrash[1482] : Saved crashreport to /var/mobile/Library/Logs/CrashReporter/KitchenSink_2010-11-08-162939_Mr-Pink-iPod.plist using uid: 0 gid: 0, synthetic_euid: 501 egid: 0

{html}
